multiplechoiceresponse.label: In Project Scheduling, What is last checking item that you will check with the schedule? A. Make sure all tasks have resources assigned to them B. Make sure the calendar is appropriate, and has appropriate holidays in it C. Make sure vacations are accounted for somewhere and there are no resources on vacations D. Make sure that the scheduling budget makes sense E. Make sure there are no resources that are entered into the project management tool multiple times F. Make sure that there are no dangling tasks G. Make sure that the resources, your resources on your schedule are not over allocated
